decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the reports, specifications, and drawings as detailed: 
	
Design and Access Statement, N1-N5, Reserved Matters Application (November 2022) by Squire & Partners
EIA Statement of Conformity dated 18th November 2022 by AECOM
Fire Statement London Plan D12 and D5 Nine Elms Square - Buildings N1 to N5 (November 2022 Revision P03) by WSP
Revised Internal Daylight and Sunlight Report: NES N1-N5 Reserved Matters Application (17 November 2022 Revision B) by GIA
Nine Elms Square N1-N5 Landscape Architecture Design and Access Statement (November 2022) by Gillespies
Nine Elms Square Buildings N1-N5 Pedestrian Level Wind Microclimate Assessment (17th November 2022) by RWDI
Solar Glare Assessment: NES N1-N5 Reserved Matters Application (15th November 2022 Revision A) by GIA
Nine Elms Square Buildings N1-N5 Reserved Matters Application Transport Report (November 2022) by Caneparo Associates
Nine Elms Square Buildings N1-N5 Flood Risk Assessment and Drainage Strategy (November 2022) by WSP
Nine Elms Square N1-N5 Loading Bay and Phase 2A Basement Entrance Details (February 2023) by Squire & Partners
Nine Elms Square - N1-N5 Landscape Sketchbook (08/03/2023) by Gillespies
BREEAM Memo dated 28th March 2023 by AECOM
Nine Elms Square Site Wide Play (05/04/2023) by Gillespies
Daylight Performance of N1-N5 of the Nine Elms Square Development - Report Addendum (06/04/2023) by GIA
Nine Elms Square Buildings N1-N5 Reserved Matters Application (Revision 3 May 2023) by Peter Connell Associates
Daylight Performance of N1-N5 of the Nine Elms Square Development - Supplementary Note (19/05/2023) by GIA
Operational Waste Management Plan (May 2023 Revision 3) by AECOM
NCGM - Northern Site, Buildings N1-N5 Reserved Matters Application - Planning Statement November 2022 (amended July 2023) by Deloitte

Received 13/10/2023:
Buildings N1- N5, Non-Material Amendment Application to RMA approval (ref.2022/4809) Revision 1, Octobe

Condition : 2 - Received 07/11/2023:
Dwg. Nos. OTC-SQP-ZZ-11-DR-AR-041011 P02, NES-GIL-SW-ZZ-DR-LA-000101 P04
Received 16/11/2023:
Dwg. Nos. NES-GIL-SW-ZZ-DR-LA-000104 P04, NES-GIL-SW-ZZ-DR-LA-000401 P04
Received 17/11/2023:
Design Statement for Non-Material Amendment (Section 96A) Application (October 2023) by Squire

REASON: To ensure a satisfactory standard of development, and to allow the local planning authority to review potential changes to the scheme.
site_name: Site Of Covent Garden Market Authority
description: Application under S96A of the Town & Country Planning Act for 'non-material' amendments (revisions to the approved drawings listed in Condition 1 following detailed design development, including alterations to the unit mix and alteration to core layouts and design and other consequential amendments) to planning permission dated 26/07/2023 ref. 2022/4809.
